title: Aromatherapy Candle with Clear Quartz Crystal - K2A Skincare | By Karen Agnês | Cleanse & Hydrate Your Skin
author: Name
description: How much self care do you do? Our beautiful Soy Candle is infused with fragrances of : Japanese persimmon, Black currant, Lychee flower, Rose, Wood and Musk, It comes with a Clear Quartz stone which is great to meditate with. Meditation will help relax and calm you. Clear Quartz is associated with the Crown Chakra which promotes spiritual connection, transformation and universal consciousness. What steps do you do to indulge in yourself?
